div.p: The RS element, available everywhere throughout the textbase from Div1 level down, is a general-purpose name element for all non-personal, non-geographical names, names that merit tagging for either display purposes or for search and retrieval, but that are not adequately covered by the name, orgName, place, or title elements. Encloses the word or words of the name only. Available throughout the system, it has no attributes. Used for names of objects which have names, e.g. ships. locomotives, space capsules.

Do not tag the names of wars, military campaigns, legislation, or any other events with RS. Do not tag the names of mountains, mountain regions, lakes, rivers, or other geographic features with RS. These examples are Regions.

Question: How do I tag paintings, films, and musical scores? Answer: Use the Title element: Monographic for operas, musical scores, albums, exhibitions, and films, Analytic for songs (which may be part of a larger collection), and individual paintings and drawings.
